nodes.text: The Duros slums, also known as the Duros Residential Zone, was a section of the Duros Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. It was home numerous alien refugees.
The Duros slums appears as part of the Duros Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
